Reference

Time Series

create_dtw_grids()

Create a parameter grid list for dtwclust and dtw distance functions

dtw_dist_gridsearch()

Perform a grid search of parameters on dtwclust distance functions

test_fable_resids()

Autocorrelation test of the residuals of dynamic regression fable models with various specifications that have been fitted for a grouping variable

test_lm_resids()

Autocorrelation tests of the residuals of lm models with various specifications that have been fitted for a grouping variable

prewhitened_ccf()

Calculate cross-correlation coefficients for prewhitened time series

Visualization

to_js_array()

Converts data columns to a js array

Indiana COVID-19 Positivity Rates Data Set

Ohio COVID-19 Data Set

us_regional_cases

US Regional COVID-19 Positive Cases Data Set

us_regional_deaths

US Regional COVID-19 Deaths Data Set
